Code Changes From CVS/GIT Repositories


ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: clarify parent_span meaning.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControl.c: reverse change allowing start = 0
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: fix bug in setting up locus obj. for new feature which has a locus.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2010_02_05.shtml
  • src/zmapServer/: acedb/acedbServer.c, das/dasServer.c: removed featureContext->length
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.21341/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/Makefile.common: re-instate the installation of static libraries
  • src/bootstrap: add in warnings flag from aclocal.
  • src/zmapControl/: zmapControlRemoteReceive.c, zmapControl_P.h: fix my own stupid mistake, wrong params for map-event callback.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h, zmapFeature/zmapFeatureContext.c, zmapFeature/zmapFeature_P.h, zmapServer/zmapServerProtocolHandler.c, zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowNavigator.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowState.c: restored partial sequence display (not starting from 1)
  • src/bootstrap: remove --warnings flag that I put in, not supported on all platforms.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: added a comment after checking rev comp related code
  • src/: zmapFeature/zmapFeature3FrameTranslation.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowDNA.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowDNAChoose.c: set block sequence to be inner loaded protion not logical seq from 1
  • src/zmapControl/remote/zmapXRemote.c: fix logging messages to go to stderr when code compiled into non-zmap prog.
  • src/runconfig: allow setting of --prefix=dir arg.
  • src/zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c: suspected glitch in CVS: addMapping function returned to spec
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: fix bug causing us to ask for wrong type of local sequence from acedb.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowItemFactory.c: removed debug printfs
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerBlock.c: fix small bug in mark setting, mark coords are zero-based, not sequence-based.

  • Browse CVS
  • Removed an unused variable

  • Fixed a bug with middle-click highlighting.
  • This was a regression introduced in the recent column changes; the column width was not being calculated correctly.

  • Added help info for new column functionality.
  • Improvements to Blixem columns.
  • All columns now have a default width set. There is a tick button to show/hide the column on the Settings dialog. The organism column is on by default whenever the data is loaded for it.
  • Fixed a bug in the mouse-move handler for the greyramp tool.
  • Incremented version to 4.1.4
  • Changes to colour scheme.
  • Made the background colour for matching bases a slightly bluer and less garish cyan (as requested in RT19950). Tidied up the colour definitions in utilities.h and made their use more consistent. Made some improvements to print colours.
  • Allow negated coords in go-to-position dialog.
  • Allow the user to enter a negated coord in the go-to dialog. (Previously, real coords were assumed, which was unintuitive when the display is showing negated coords.) Also added bounds checking and proper error messages if the value is out of range.
  • Fixed a bug with initialising the selected base index.
  • The bug was to do with -1 being used to indicate that the base index was not set. However, this was ambiguous because -1 can be a real coordinate. This was the cause of the problems seen in RT199350, where Blixem was showing an incorrect coordinate for the selected base index in protein mode, if the user had not previously selected an index. Also in this change are a small fix to some help page text and the removal of a (currently) unused menu item.
